title: No, Joe Biden Didn’t Save Christmas
sub_head: Millions of American workers saved a complex economy from buckling.
body:
It’s hard to say whose comments I look forward to more—the president of the United States or presidential explainer Jen Psaki. The two bring to mind a great line of Sydney Greenstreet’s fat criminal Kasper Gutman in “The Maltese Falcon”: “By gad, sir, you are a character. There’s never any telling what you’ll say or do next, except that it’s bound to be something astonishing.”
Mr. Biden’s topper this week on Covid-19: “Look, there is no federal solution. This gets solved at the state level.” By gad, sir!
